snippet: Prompted by publicity surrounding recent child abuse scandals, dozens of British men have come forward about molestation they say they suffered at expensive private schools.
abstract: Publicity surrounding child abuse scandals involving well-known figures is prompting dozens of British men to come forward with reports of molestation they say they suffered as boys at expensive private schools decades earlier; disclosures are forcing schools to confront allegations that in the past might have been hushed up, ignored or viewed with contempt.
lead_paragraph: Prompted by publicity surrounding recent child abuse scandals, dozens of British men have come forward about molestation they say they suffered at expensive private schools.

headline.main: Wave of Sexual Abuse Allegations for Private Boys’ Schools in Britain
headline.print_headline: Wave of Sexual Abuse Allegations for Private Boys’ Schools in Britain
